Package danogl.components

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
danogl.components.Transform
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
Encapsulates some properties of a GameObject that are related to its transform from object-space to world-space
Author:
Dan Nirel

      public void setDimensions​(float x, float y)

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      Description copied from interface: Component
      When the a GameObject is assigned this component, it calls this method in every update
      Specified by:
      update in interface Component
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time, in seconds, since the previous update

    • isAccelerationEnabled

      public boolean isAccelerationEnabled()
      Is the acceleration applied in this frame. The answer will be false if accelerating will cause the object to intersect with an object it is set to not intersect with.

    • setAccelerationEnabled

      public void setAccelerationEnabled​(boolean accelerationEnabled)
      Set whether the acceleration should be applied in this frame. Used to prevent objects that are set to not intersect from intersecting.
